name: Remitbee Inc
description: Developer of a financial platform designed for cross-currency money transfer transactions. The company's money transfer platform offers a user-friendly service in which customers can send money online using their web browsers, tablets and mobile phones, enabling users to easily send money straight from their bank accounts and cash accounts worldwide.
one_liner: Developer of a financial platform designed for cross-currency money transfer transactions. The company's money transfer platform offers a user-friendly service in which customers can send money online using their web browsers, tablets and mobile phones, enabling users to easily send money straight from their bank accounts and cash accounts worldwide.
